name: A Day In The Life (SnoozyBinch)
description:
arrow keys to move : Enter is Start : Space-bar is Select/Back : alt controls are num pad for movement, with enter being start and 0 being select

I made this in a few hours with no background knowledge of game development. This is one of many prototypes for the game I would actually like to make one day. I hope you enjoy! 

Play as me, Snoozy Binch, in an average day at work at a casino. EXPLORATION is the name of the game, good luck and have fun!
